name: Doodle Shuffle Board Lite
description:
*****Hot Doodle Game*****
<a href="http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/doodle-shuffle-board/id368923697?mt=8&ls=1
" target="_blank">http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/doodle-shuffle-board/id368923697?mt=8&ls=1
</a>

This is not a simple doodle game but an interesting shuffle board with excellent physical properties!
Maybe you have played the real shuff board in clubs, or you have palyed shuffle board games on iphone or ipod.
But "Doodle Shuffle Board" is really different from them.
And once you start palying, you can't stop it!

FEATURES:
•Interactive Touch Screen Play
•Excellent physical properties
•A full desktop display showing the current status of competition
•Complete the scoring table shows the score
•Crowd reactions that reflect your moves in real time
•Adjustable game settings
